mapper.insert: insert into kj_zxjb( id, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, loginname, api_resultcode, api_resultmsg, bc_status, gems_id, gems_fs_id, gems_code, smscode, query_type, c_name, c_tel, c_cardno, api_result )values( #{id}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{loginname}, #{api_resultcode}, #{api_resultmsg}, #{bc_status}, #{gems_id}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{gems_code}, #{smscode}, #{query_type}, #{c_name}, #{c_tel}, #{c_cardno}, #{api_result} )
